alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon Cascade Foothills; Willamette National Forest (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 24 at 2:19PM PDT until August 25 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS EXPECTED THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING ACROSS ZONES 605, 606, 607, 608, AND 660... .Hot and dry conditions return today as high pressure builds back into the region. The initial concern through this afternoon will be gusty east winds, low relative humidity, and unstable conditions. Winds will be strongest near the Columbia River Gorge. A disturbance aloft may then trigger thunderstorms with abundant lightning tonight into Friday morning. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT FRIDAY FOR DRY AND UNSTABLE CONDITIONS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 606 AND 608... * AFFECTED AREA...In Oregon, Fire Weather Zone 606 Central Oregon Cascade Foothills and Fire Weather Zone 608 Willamette National Forest. * WINDS...East 5 to 10 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 20 percent. * THUNDERSTORMS...3 (A chance of thunderstorms). * HAINES...Mid-level Haines Index 6 or high potential for large plume dominated fire growth. * IMPACTS...Conditions may be favorable for rapid fire spread which may threaten life and property. Use extra caution with potential ignition sources, especially in grassy areas. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of the above conditions can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Central Oregon Cascade Foothills; Willamette National Forest
